format: dashboard

```{python}
import plotly.express as px
import inspect_viz as vz

# parameters
petal_width = vz.Param(default=2.5)
petal_length = vz.Param(default=7)

# data source
df = vz.DataFrame(px.data.iris()).query(f"""
    SELECT * FROM df 
    WHERE petal_width < {petal_width} AND petal_length < {petal_length}
""")
```


## Row {.toolbar}

```{python}
vz.menu_input(df, column="species")
vz.slider_input(df, column="petal_width", param=petal_width)
vz.slider_input(df, column="petal_length", param=petal_length)
```

## Row 

### Column

```{python}
fig = px.scatter(df, x="sepal_width", y="sepal_length")
vz.figure_view(df, fig)
```

```{python}
vz.table_view(df)
```
